## AbstractDevice.createTextureVideo() method

Creates a video texture from a video element

**Signature:**

```typescript
createTextureVideo(el: HTMLVideoElement, samplerOptions?: SamplerOptions): TextureVideo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | HTMLVideoElement | The video element |
|  samplerOptions | [SamplerOptions](doc/markdown/./device.sampleroptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

[TextureVideo](doc/markdown/./device.texturevideo.md)
